Key Match Events: Jude Bellingham scored the first shot on target for England in the 95th minute with an overhead kick
Harry Kane headed England into a 2-1 lead in extra time
Post-Match Reflections: Gareth Southgate's tenure was seemingly about to end in ignominy before England's comeback
Southgate has done impressive work in charge of England, but a drastic improvement is needed against Switzerland
Miscellaneous Highlights: England's performance in Gelsenkirchen was best summarised by a defender standing with arms outstretched, furious at the lack of options in front of them
England's players took one extra touch on the ball before looking up and assessing their options, leading to a slow and laboured tempo
Others: England will play Switzerland in the quarter-final and it seems fair to say they will need to play an awful lot better in Dusseldorf next Saturday
